channel.title: Sunita||Developers Recruiting||
channel.description:
[img]http://i39.tinypic.com/25iu9a0.png[/img] [hr] Hello my name is Bullos I_Hybrid_I and me are starting a new Server its called Sunita
We are going to use Lost legacy as Base Lost legacy is developed By PlayBoy (on mopar RsInFecTion)
We really liked the Lost Legacy so we decided! We are going to use Lost Legacy as base.
[size=24pt]Suntia Features[/size]
What we have done so far Project started @ 19-5-2013
[size=24pt]original Features[/size] these features are original from Lost Legacy
[size=24pt]Suntia Media[/size] our new Loading bar [video=youtube;DU_ZMX-I2Wg]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DU_ZMX-I2Wg[/video]
our new Background
[img]http://i43.tinypic.com/5mcm5l.png[/img]
[size=24pt]Official Media From Lost Legacy[/size]
[img]http://i45.tinypic.com/5x5uz9.png[/img] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/qrkkfa.png[/img] [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/2nhlu86.png[/img] [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2z80vnb.png[/img] [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/33ljhiq.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/hrHfL5z.gif[/img]
we are not going to leech all this, we just wanna show of what we already have. thanks to Playboy For making this
[font=impact][size=28pt]Wanna Join this Project?[/size][/font]
fill in this as apply.
Name: In-game name: Applying for : Age : Past experience : Skype : Something extra :
hopefully see you soon!
- The Sunita Development Team

item.title: Sunita||Developers Recruiting||
item.dc:creator: @Bullos Bullos
item.description:
@Bullos wrote:

[quote=“pkkid, post:19, topic:519713”]Name:
In-game name: -
Applying for : client/server side programmer (can do both)
Age : 17
Past experience : My last project was Vanity. Had around 50 players daily, but it’s down now due some difficulties with the server owners. I’m make some “fun” clients at the moment. Dropped Project Decimate’s players from 250 to around 100. I can do some security checks on your client.
Skype : PM me your skype
Something extra : 4 years of experience with Java.[/quote]
Add my skype: blessed.city

Read full topic

item.title: Sunita||Developers Recruiting||
item.dc:creator: @Bullos Bullos
item.description:
@Bullos wrote:

[quote=“nolan2131, post:12, topic:519713”][quote author=Bullos link=topic=638207.msg4301885#msg4301885 date=1369143943]

Allow me to beta test, and start an advertisement team. I would offer up to develop but that requires to much time and dedication (Which I would be willing to put in, although it would be difficult since I start a full time job this summer.) Anyways if considered I’ll fill out an application anyways.

Name: Nolan
In-game name: Nolan
Applying for : Beta Tester/ Advert Team
Age : 18
Past experience : I was a developer on Final Judgement for Loveandpower ^ :D, I was on the Advertisement Team of T.U.Pk.S for Ahram 4, I Moderated on Nividia for Encryption, I Administrated/ Advertised on HamziX for Hamza, and I have done quite a few Beta Testings, and misc positions on misc servers throughout my RSPS career.
Skype : nolan-peterson
Something extra : Good luck with your project regardless, I will be keeping an eye on it.

Thanks for your application!
Welcome to the team, do you got skype or anything?
[/quote]

Thanks, and yes I have skype @ nolan-peterson (It may say I’m offline but it’s through my phone so I’m always available.)[/quote]
Added

Read full topic

[/quote]
Thanks for your application!
Welcome to the team, do you got skype or anything?[/quote]
